name: My Virtual Talking Girl
description:
Are you a little shy? Do you have little social life? Are you a weird guy or geek or friki?
This application will solve your problem and change your life: It is your virtual synthetic girlfriend and lives on your mobile device. She is realistic and is in 3d, with twists and poses.
Take care of she as if were real, give it pampering, you are an otaku of love.
It has its basic needs, so you should feed and take care of.
You also have to feed her and take her to her room to sleep, so she will recharge the batteries for you. She is not a virtual pet, she is a lot of machine code that runs in the software layer of your device, so she has no feelings.
You have a store where you can buy dresses and accessories so you can be happier (she does not care).
The coins for the store can be earned in the minigames, watching advertising videos or paying real money if you are in a hurry.
You can also change some aspects of the character, such as hair and skin color.
It is the most beautiful virtual girl that exists in cyberspace, it has taken me months to create such a sweet face.
Capture images and share them with your friends, they will thank you. You have a button to make screenshots that hides the menu items.
